heading: HR02421
0: AN EXTREMELY URGENT THE RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF INTERIOR AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT (DILG), AND OTHER APPROPRIATE GOVERNMENT AGENCIES INCLUDING THE COMMISSION ON ELECTIONS (COMELEC), TO INVESTIGATE, INQUIRE, AND STREAMLINE THE APPLICATION PROCESS OF EXEMPTION OF SECURITY PERSONNEL FROM THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE - POLICE SECURITY AND PROTECTION GROUP (PNP-PSPG), IN VIEW OF THE UPCOMING 2019 ELECTIONS
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC ORDER AND SAFETY since 2019-01-23
history:
